channel.title: Help with my Hamachi Server
channel.description:
I have my server and everything is working fine, But what i need to know is when people log in, How can i do it so they have a welcome message if you know what i mean.
So when they log in they see this message, Im sure it can be done because ive seen it on other private servers..? So please help me :D
Also if you know any other cool stuff for my server then please tell me :D
Thanks :D[br][size=1]Posted at: December 21, 2006, 02:19:59 PM[/size][hr]BRB, If you have a message please leave and ill reply ASAP

Look in the tutorial section, i’m sure theres something there
